Revision 1.27 2009/01/14 00:20:55 bruno unify the physical node and VM node boot action functionality
- all bootaction's are global
- the node table has a 'runaction' (what bootaction should the node do when a node normally boots) and an 'installaction (the bootaction for installs).
- the 'boot' table has an entry for each node and it dictates what the node will do on the next boot -- it will look up the runaction in the nodes table (for a normal boot) or the installaction in the nodes table (for an install).
